      • AgentSrv

        public AgentSrv()

    • Method Detail

      • setLock

        public static void setLock(boolean lock)
        Sets the service layer's underlying data store locking policy.
        Parameters:
        lock - if set to true, individual underlying data stores will be locked upon access.

      • create

        public static AgentDao create(long requestId,
                              long adminId)
                       throws SrvException
        Creates or updates an agent for a specific request that is not currently accepted, on behalf of a specific admin.
        Parameters:
        requestId - id of the request for which the agent is being created.
        adminId - id of the admin that is creating the agent.
        Returns:
        the created agent object containing its generated id, or null if the agent was not found after creating it.
        Throws:
        SrvException - if request id or admin id are invalid, the request's status is already accepted, the admin is not logged in, the agent could not be created or updated, or a data access error occurs.

      • findById

        public static AgentDao findById(long agentId)
                         throws SrvException
        Retrieves the agent with specified id.
        Parameters:
        agentId - the agent's id.
        Returns:
        the agent found or null if an agent with specified id was not found.
        Throws:
        SrvException - if a data access error occurs.

      • findByRequestId

        public static AgentDao findByRequestId(long requestId)
                                throws SrvException
        Retrieves the agent with specified request id.
        Parameters:
        requestId - the agent's request id.
        Returns:
        the agent found or null if an agent with specified request id was not found.
        Throws:
        SrvException - if a data access error occurs.

      • findAllWithAdminId

        public static java.util.Set<AgentDao> findAllWithAdminId(long adminId)
                                                  throws SrvException
        Retrieves all agents created or updated by a specific admin.
        Parameters:
        adminId - the admin's id.
        Returns:
        a set of objects, each representing an agent.
        Throws:
        SrvException - if an admin with specified id does not exist, or a data access error occurs.

      • findAll

        public static java.util.Set<AgentDao> findAll()
                                       throws SrvException
        Retrieves all agents currently in store.
        Returns:
        a set of objects, each representing an agent.
        Throws:
        SrvException - if a data access error occurs.

      • findAllWithRequestStatus

        public static java.util.Set<AgentDao> findAllWithRequestStatus(RequestStatus requestStatus)
                                                        throws SrvException
        Retrieves all agents that correspond to requests with a specific status.
        Parameters:
        requestStatus - the requests' status.
        Returns:
        a set of objects, each representing an agent.
        Throws:
        SrvException - if a data access error occurs.

      • jobsRequested

        public static void jobsRequested(long agentId)
                          throws SrvException
        Sets an agent's jobs request time to the current time.
        Parameters:
        agentId - the agent's id
        Throws:
        SrvException - if an agent with specified id does not exist, its jobs request time could not be set, or a data access error occurs.

      • terminate

        public static void terminate(long agentId)
                      throws SrvException
        Sets an agent's termination time to the current time.
        Parameters:
        agentId - the agent's id
        Throws:
        SrvException - if an agent with specified id does not exist, its termination time could not be set, or a data access error occurs.
